dashboard.title: NS8 migration
dashboard.connect_description: Enter the following information to start migrating applications to an existing NethServer 8 cluster
dashboard.status_migrating: Migration initialized. Click Sync data and then Finish migration when you are ready
dashboard.virtual_host_explanation: Nextcloud needs to be configured on a virtual host to work properly on NethServer 8
dashboard.account_provider_migration_in_progress_d: NS8 apps are currently using NS7 account provider
dashboard.start_account_provider_migration_explana: Do not shutdown or disconnect the leader node {leaderNode} until the migration has finished
dashboard.ad_ip_address_explanation: Select an IP address to configure Active Directory
dashboard.logout_explanation: Do you really want to logout from {leaderNode}? You will have to start over the migration process
dashboard.logout_explanation_remote_account_provid: You have finished to migrate your applications, the remote account provider cannot be migrated, do you want to logout from {leaderNode}?
dashboard.finish_account_provider_migration_explan: The local account provider will be disabled and the cluster connection will be closed
dashboard.finish_app_migration_explanation: Migration will be finalized and {appName} will be stopped and disabled in NethServer 7.
dashboard.app_will_be_migrated: {appName} will be migrated to NethServer 8 cluster {leaderNode}.
dashboard.logout_not_allowed_explanation: Cannot logout and connect to a different NS8 cluster: some apps have already been migrated
dashboard.app_migrated_with_email: This app is migrated together with Email app
dashboard.roundcube_webtop_migration: If Webmail, WebTop and/or POP3/IMAP Connector are currently installed, they will be migrated too.
dashboard.roundcube_webtop_sogo_migration: If Webmail, WebTop , SOGo and/or POP3/IMAP Connector are currently installed, they will be migrated too.
dashboard.remote_account_provider_no_migration: Remote account provider doesn't need to be migrated
dashboard.local_account_provider_migrate_last: Local account provider must be migrated after all other apps
dashboard.abort_current_app: Would you like to abort the migration of {app} application? If you change your mind you can restart the migration later.
dashboard.error_on_abort: There was an error during the abort procedure.
dashboard.external_user_domain_error: This machine uses an external account provider. Before starting the migration, you must configure the same external user domain inside NS8 cluster.
dashboard.internal_user_domain_error: The NS8 cluster already has a user domain for the '{domain}' domain. Before starting the migration, remove the '{domain}' domain from the NS8 cluster.
dashboard.status_not_available: This app is disabled or not configured
dashboard.status_skipped: This application will not be migrated
dashboard.error_on_skip: There was an error when changing the skip flag.
dashboard.app_migrated_with_ad: This app is migrated together with Local Active Directory app
dashboard.enable_forge_sogo: To successfully migrate SOGo, ensure NethForge repository is enabled under NS8 Settings

validation.ad_ip_address_empty: Active Directory IP address is required
